data.message: You clearly said I’m a POS shit for voting for Trump. Don’t worry we will do you like we did the hurting NFL. #BoycottEminem

replies.message: Yeah, that'll happen. 🤦

The NFL will be just fine as well as Eminem...consumers will always go back to what they love even after a little butthurt...
we won too in nfl, the sobs have to stand now. they can piss on flag on their own time not ours...the fans pay their salary
Hey Slim, you white crack HO....what happened? I was a fan until your godless ass insulted my Trump family. I will be insulting your ass ALL DAY LONG cause IDGAF what happens to you now bitch
Louie R Trump lmfao.....  best true meme ever 😂😂
Sarah Stiehl
Did all that collagen get to your head?? 😂👀

It isn't career suicide. Eminem is worth millions of dollars. He could never put out a single song ever again and still be just fine. It is loosers like you that need to get the fuck over it. He has the same right to his opinion as you do to be pussy hurt and cry about it on facebook like your opinion matters to him. Eminem isn't Kathy Griffin. 90 million likes still.... I am sure your individual boycott won't do shit.
You should listen to "White America". That I am sure a lot of people thought was career suicide, and that like this stunt, only made him more popular.
The big scary rapper said something you don't like. Better run to facebook and bitch about it like your opinion matters to him.
You are a POS for voting for Trump
Will see watch his concert attendance shrink and his record sales drop :) fuck off feminem 😂😂😂😂
NFL is still on, dummy ... lol
NFL is losing a lot of support and money and eventually they'll cave
NFL isn't losing shit!   Gambling fuels it not anyone standing or kneeling!

Melissa Irvin Smith And yet, his fan base is still strong. Eminem is still worth over a hundred million dollars. While you continue struggle just to provide for your kids. Eminem and his career will be just fine. This is no where near his first political comment. It isn't even his first shot at trump.
This white middle aged rapper is a joke. When I was 17 I liked him. I thought he was cool. Now I think he is clown. Adults don't behave like he does.

You are hilarious with your threats hahaha fuck you from the man EM Hahaha he told YOU to fuck off
